SignificanceAttributeEval - Class in weka.attributeSelection
Significance :

Evaluates the worth of an attribute by computing the Probabilistic Significance as a two-way function.
(attribute-classes and classes-attribute association)

For more information see:

Amir Ahmad, Lipika Dey (2004).
SignificanceAttributeEval() - Constructor for class weka.attributeSelection.SignificanceAttributeEval
Constructor

T

toString() - Method in class weka.attributeSelection.SignificanceAttributeEval

weka.attributeSelection - package weka.attributeSelection
